title: Pantrichef
description: AI-powered recipe assistant that helps users generate meal ideas from the ingredients they already have. It invites visitors to input what's in their fridge or pantry and receive instant recipe suggestions, aiming to reduce food waste, save money, and make meal planning easier.

title: HPS Scheduling system
description: HPS Scheduling is a scheduling system designed to prioritize individuals needs and foster personalized care or service delivery.

title: Waste Management with mobile notification system for CENRO
description: WMMNS provides web and mobile platform to improve waste management in Santiago city. It addresses several problems like missed collection hours, redundant routes. Poor communication, and lack of tracking for garbage truck itineraries.

title: Algo Trading Website
description: Algo-trading website with an integrated Content Management System (CMS), empowering users to streamline trading strategies and manage content effortlessly

title: Kwikhub
description: A cutting-edge Customer relationship management system designed to streamline customer engagement, improve sales processes and optimize data management for business.

title: LiteCRM
description: A lightweight yet powerful CRM system for small to medium size enterprises, focusing on simplicity, efficiency, and ease of use

title: MapVerty: A web-based student household information manegement system with poverty and malnutrition analysis for isabela state univesity - Santiago extension unit
description: An information management that provides functionality for handling and identify experiencing poverty through geographical mapping. Facilitates the analysis of the povertyindex and malnutrition status of the students at Isabela state university Santiago extension unit.
